#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;
int main()
{
    ll t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {   string str1,str2;
        ll fs1[26]={0}, fs2[26]={0};
        cin>>str1>>str2;
        ll i=0;
        while(str1[i]!='\0')
            fs1[str1[i]-'a']++,i++;
            i=0;
       while(str2[i]!='\0')
            fs2[str2[i]-'a']++,i++;
            ll flag=0;
            for(ll i=0;i<26;i++){
                if(fs1[i]!=fs2[i]){
                    flag=1;
                break;
                }

            }
            if(flag==1)
                cout<<"NO"<<endl;

            else cout<<"YES"<<endl;



    }

}
